Page.SubjectTT: Electrical Power UP For External Power

CheckpointDesc.ExpectationTT: TEST (thrust levers full forward and back to idle)

Action.Code: (E:Time of Day,enum) 3 == if{ 0 (L:switch_125_73X, number) == if{ 12501 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } } els{ 1 (L:switch_125_73X, number) == if{ 12501 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } }
(E:Time of Day,enum) 3 == if{ 0 (L:switch_126_73X, number) == if{ 12601 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } } els{ 1 (L:switch_126_73X, number) == if{ 12601 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } }

Page.SubjectTT: Electrical Power UP For APU Power

CheckpointDesc.ExpectationTT: TEST (thrust levers full forward and back to idle)

Action.Code: 30 (L:switch_04_73X,number) - 10 div s0 :1 l0 0 > if{ 407 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) l0 -- s0 g1 } l0 0 < if{ 408 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) l0 ++ s0 g1 }
(E:Time of Day,enum) 3 == if{ 0 (L:switch_125_73X, number) == if{ 12501 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } } els{ 1 (L:switch_125_73X, number) == if{ 12501 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } }
(E:Time of Day,enum) 3 == if{ 0 (L:switch_126_73X, number) == if{ 12601 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } } els{ 1 (L:switch_126_73X, number) == if{ 12601 (>K:ROTOR_BRAKE) } }

CheckpointDesc.SubjectTT: Verify STANDBY PWR OFF BAT DISCHARGE TR UNIT and ELEC Lights
TRANSFER BUS OFF SOURCE OFF GEN OFF BUS lights
COWL ANTI ICE and COWL VALVE OPEN
AUTO FAIL light AND OFF SCHED DESCENT Light

CheckpointDesc.ExpectationTT: Retract and OFF OR OFF if LED
Set decision height or altitude reference

CheckpointDesc.SubjectTT: A/P light AND A/T light FMC light
Master LIGHTS TEST and DIM switch
CARGO FIRE panel Only on first flight of the day

CheckpointDesc.ExpectationTT: Read Speed, Heading and Altitude set

CheckpointDesc.SubjectTT: ENGINE START switch for starting Engine
if APU needed after APU start, APU GENERATOR OFF BUS
If External power needed GRD POWER AVAILABLE light
